subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|yomi=o}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=し'|-}} {{ltc-l|時}}. The ''{{ll|ja|呉音|goon}}'' reading, so likely the initial borrowing.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|じ}}
* The pitch accent depends on the entire appended word.
